name: Joy Mining Machinery. 2008. New Mountain Laurel Complex Successfully Installs State-of-the-Art JOY Longwall System
description:
DESCRIPTION
Data for number of shield supports used at representative longwall mining operation in southern West Virginia.

FULL CITATION
Joy Mining Machinery. 2008. New Mountain Laurel Complex Successfully Installs State-of-the-Art JOY Longwall System. Thomas Publishing Company. http://news.thomasnet.com/companystory/816524 (Accessed December 14, 2009).
